page.title: 06Downlands School
page.content: Our school is an{11-16 comprehensive {school}which now has 1,010 pupils and 53 teaching staff. It serves the villages of Albourne, Fulking, Poynings, Hurstpierpoint, Keymer as well as Hassocks and parts of Burgess Hill. Pupils come to school in trains, buses, coaches and even taxis. The subjects we study include Maths, French, English, Humanities, Science, Music, P.E. and Games. We play sports such as Rugby, Football, Cricket, Rounders, Hockey, Tennis, Stoolball, Badmington, Golf and Swimming. Our Headmaster is called Mr. Perkins and he has been at the school for 3\ years. Pupils leaving the school at 16 have the opportunity of continuing their education at the Sixth Form College in Haywards Heath.
